intro.content:
Let's be honest, it's a complicated period of time and everybody is exhausted.
So I won't start with my usual question 'How's everything going?' but will rather ask you: 'I hope you are doing okay?'

Otherwise, on the menu this week quite a lot of animals video: Cats, dogs, ducks and a super cute spider video - didn't know I could ever say that.

Courage!

hero.title: Farewell Art
hero.description: From shadow to light / De l'ombre à  la lumière
hero.why:
Earlier this week while browsing my Twitter history I stumbled upon this video from the artist and performer Farewell.
If I remember distinctly sharing this video back in 2014 I actually never took the time to see the others ones!
So give yourself a favor and watch these creative gems :-)

randomArticles.title: Bolivian monastery accepts four-legged friar
randomArticles.description: A dog who lives in a monastery and has dressed in a traditional habit has become an internet hit.

randomArticles.title: Son surprises his mom that he hasn't seen in seven months.
randomArticles.description: "Where did all this pollen come from?"

randomArticles.title: (FR) Sauvons les petites filles de la baie du Mt St Michel menacés d'expulsion.
Documenting the Syrian revolution
randomArticles.description: An interactive map to see the positive outlook despite of the war.

animalCorner.title: American woodcock luring worms
animalCorner.description: Now this is just too darn cute!  I think we should all dance for our dinner!

animalCorner.title: What's the most weird thing that triggers your dog?
